mapper.sql: ItemCode_Auto, ItemType, Num, ItemName, Memo, IsActive, Seq, V1, V2, A1
mapper.select: select Num from ItemCode where ItemType=#{itemType} and Num in (7,11,12,16,22,30,83,145) order by Seq desc

declare @ItemType int = #{itemType}, @num bigint = #{num}
if(@ItemType=413)--回租报价 begin if(@num = 100) Select Num,ItemName From ItemCode Where Num != 1 and ItemType = @ItemType Order By Seq,Num else Select Num,ItemName From ItemCode Where Num != 1 and ItemType = @ItemType and Num = @num Order By Seq,Num end
if(@ItemType=326)--业务类别 begin if(@num = 100) Select Num,ItemName From ItemCode Where ItemType = @ItemType Order By Seq,Num else Select Num,ItemName From ItemCode Where ItemType = @ItemType and Num = @num Order By Seq,Num end

declare @type int=#{itemType}--833申请事由，用车类别,810车牌照地区,231车辆选择类别,865事由说明 BEGIN if @type=833 begin select num=0,ItemName='==请选择==' union all select num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=833 and num in (1,2) end
if @type=810 begin select num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=810 end
if @type=231 begin select num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=231 end if @type=865 begin select num=0,ItemName='==请选择==' union all select num,ItemName from ItemCode where ItemType=865 end END
